title: Any content you add to the site is permanently public

tosdr.case: You cannot delete your contributions, but it makes sense for this service
tosdr.tldr: This is a disadvantage and terrible idea for users who added information they did not realize they should not have added to the site. This is especially a detriment for any minors (users under the age of 21) who use the service, whenever they add content which could affect them or hurt them.
